title.value: Selection as an aspect of innovation process
Selection as an aspect of innovation process

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Shklyarov, A.P., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Bokhan, A.I., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Potato, Vegetable and Fruit Growing (Belarus). Institute for Vegetable Growing

abstract.value: Selection appears the process of creation, testing and introduction of new sorts and hybrids of agricultural plants and represents the process of implementation of scientific ideas into the practice, which in its turn appears innovation activity, directly influencing the quality of selection process and economic efficiency of the whole agronomic branch. The process of the development of new sorts and hybrids of agricultural plants, propagation and implementation of the new sorts into production process, strain renovation and substitution is considered to be economically efficient and profitable. Therefore, the main goal of the research appears the evaluation of the process of selection as the one of the aspects of innovative activity. The role of selection in the context of food security has been considered in the article. Achievements, problems and tasks of the selection at the current level of agricultural production development have been revealed. The cost based mechanism of the selection process reflecting its economic essence has been analyzed.
